comments:
1. Have a project in the Explorer view
2. Press the Menu button
3. Select Show -> Projects
4. Unhandled event loop exception occurs

note : if you select Menu button -> Show -> Working Set(instead of Projects), then repeat steps 1-3 none exception will occur.

---
